attributes.action: Restore order by re-introducing the DEATH PENALTY!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I believe that in today’s society, we can not afford to be narrow-minded to the crimes going on around us...can we?
Well that’s exactly what our government intend to do for the future of the United Kingdom. Is that a future WE want to grow up in, I SAY NOT !!!
As you are reading this, I wish to point out that, the not so obvious fact, as a criminal in today’s society, you get off very lightly, a slapped wrist for murdering a 73 year old man while he sleeps in his bed, or paedophiles that pray on our innocent children, then let to live 3 miles from the nearest primary school?
Watching our backs when we leave our front doors?

As taxpayers, we fund this kind of treatment to criminals who get away with these kind of crimes.

Crimes our government would call "petty"

Petty is not murder, petty is nicking a penny sweet from a corner shop.

Back to the subject, castrate paedophiles chemically, and death by hanging or electrocution for cold blooded murderers.

Lets follow in the footsteps of the Americans, introduce DEATH ROW to BRITAIN.

Let us British Taxpayers make a stand against crimes we suffer everyday, it could be any one of us that makes the ten o'clock news, let us not be a statistic... VOTE NOW !!!
